Question
========
What is the primary purpose of Continuous Integration (CI) in the SDLC?

Answerlist
----------
* To automate testing and integration of code changes
* To gather requirements from stakeholders
* To design the system architecture
* To deploy applications to production
* To monitor application performance

Solution
========
Continuous Integration (CI) automates the testing and integration of code changes, ensuring that new code integrates smoothly with the existing codebase.
